english: The Polytechnic University of Cartagena has given this noon a reading, conducted by the manager, Isidro Ibarra, of the manifesto prepared by the Network of Gender Equality Units for University Excellence on the occasion of the International Day for the Elimination of Violence against Women.

ï»¿spanish: A continuaciÃÂ³n, el texto ÃÂ­ntegro: ÃÂ«Desde hace varias dÃÂ©cadas, el 25N, DÃÂ­a Internacional por la erradicaciÃÂ³n de la Violencia contra las Mujeres, es un momento excepcional para reivindicar, reclamar y recordar a las personas con responsabilidades y a toda la sociedad en general que, mientras persista la violencia patriarcal, no podremos conseguir sociedades justas, igualitarias y respetuosas con los derechos humanos.
english: Next, the full text: "For several decades, November 25th, International Day for the Eradication of Violence against Women, is an exceptional moment to claim, demand, and remind people with responsibilities and society in general that, as long as patriarchal violence persists, we will not be able to achieve fair, equal, and human rights-respecting societies."

ï»¿spanish: La prevalencia de las violencias es cada vez mÃÂ¡s preocupante, tal y como recoge la reciente Encuesta Europea de Violencia de GÃÂ©nero (EEVG) con datos de 2022, que seÃÂ±ala cifras extremadamente alarmantes de prevalencia de las violencias patriarcales, aunque tambiÃÂ©n dibuja un contexto positivo en relaciÃÂ³n con el mayor conocimiento y reconocimiento de estas violencias por parte de las mujeres mÃÂ¡s jÃÂ³venes.
english: The prevalence of violence is increasingly alarming, as shown by the recent European Survey on Gender-Based Violence (ESGBV) with 2022 data, which indicates extremely alarming figures of prevalence of patriarchal violence, although it also outlines a positive context regarding the greater knowledge and acknowledgment of these violences by younger women.

ï»¿spanish: Aunque en las instituciones educativas en general, y en las universidades en particular, se ha avanzado mucho en la igualdad entre mujeres y hombres, aÃÂºn perduran situaciones que violentan a las estudiantes, a las investigadoras y profesoras, y a las trabajadoras del ÃÂ¡mbito de la administraciÃÂ³n y servicios.
english: Although in educational institutions in general, and universities in particular, there has been a lot of progress in gender equality, there are still situations that violate female students, researchers and professors, and workers in the administration and services.

ï»¿spanish: En ese sentido, son relevantes las aportaciones del ÃÂProyecto Europeo UNISAFE, para acabar con las violencias de gÃÂ©nero en la AcademiaÃÂ, pues concluye que la principal razÃÂ³n por la que no se denuncian agresiones machistas en el contexto universitario es porque, en muchas ocasiones, la vÃÂ­ctima duda de la gravedad de lo sufrido, duda de si serÃÂ¡ creÃÂ­da, duda de si habrÃÂ¡ una respuesta para lo vivido.
english: In this sense, the contributions of the "European Project UNISAFE, to end gender-based violence in Academia" are relevant, as it concludes that the main reason why macho aggressions in the university context are not reported is because, in many cases, the victim doubts the severity of what has been suffered, doubts whether she will be believed, doubts whether there will be a response to what has been experienced.

ï»¿spanish: Es importante no normalizar ni naturalizar las violencias sufridas, es importante que tambiÃÂ©n en las universidades avancemos hacia la visibilizaciÃÂ³n de todas y cada una de las violencias machistas que se ejercen en su seno.
english: It is important not to normalize or naturalize the violence suffered, it is important that in universities we also move towards making visible each and every one of the macho violences exercised within them.

ï»¿spanish: Las universidades, como instituciones de enseÃÂ±anza superior, debemos contribuir a hacer frente a esta situaciÃÂ³n aportando evidencias cientÃÂ­ficas, formando a las futuras generaciones de profesionales con perspectiva de gÃÂ©nero, elaborando recursos ÃÂºtiles y efectivos para toda la sociedad y participando tanto individual como colectivamente de la cultura de igualdad que identifica, visibiliza, denuncia y aÃÂ­sla los comportamientos y actitudes machistas.
english: Universities, as institutions of higher education, must contribute to addressing this situation by providing scientific evidence, training future generations of professionals with a gender perspective, developing useful and effective resources for society as a whole, and participating both individually and collectively in the culture of equality that identifies, makes visible, denounces and isolates macho behaviors and attitudes.

ï»¿spanish: AdemÃÂ¡s de la continuidad de las violencias machistas tradicionales, surgen nuevos modos de misoginia, tales como el gendertrolling de las ÃÂturbas digitalesÃÂ en el universo online.
english: In addition to the continuity of traditional macho violences, new forms of misogyny emerge, such as gendertrolling by "digital mobs" in the online universe.

ï»¿spanish: En este contexto, sobresalen nuevos actores polÃÂ­ticos, como la ÃÂmanosferaÃÂ, alentados por movimientos trasnacionales que promueven actitudes y perspectivas misÃÂ³ginas y antifeministas.
english: In this context, new political actors stand out, such as the "manosphere," encouraged by transnational movements that promote misogynistic and anti-feminist attitudes and perspectives.

ï»¿spanish: Su influencia en la formaciÃÂ³n de opiniones y la propagaciÃÂ³n de ideas polÃÂ­ticas extremistas, estÃÂ¡n modelando imaginarios y conductas desde edades tempranas.
english: Their influence on opinion formation and the spread of extremist political ideas is shaping imaginations and behaviors from an early age.

ï»¿spanish: Un claro ejemplo de ello es el llamado ÃÂcaso AlmendralejoÃÂ, que puso en evidencia la violencia machista digital ejercida por un grupo de chicos menores de edad sobre mÃÂ¡s de veinte niÃÂ±as y adolescentes, cuya imagen fue utilizada para crear pornografÃÂ­a mediante inteligencia artificial.
english: A clear example of this is the so-called "Almendralejo case," which highlighted the digital macho violence exercised by a group of underage boys on more than twenty girls and adolescents, whose image was used to create pornography through artificial intelligence.

ï»¿spanish: El alcance mediÃÂ¡tico de este caso ha servido para que sociedad tome conciencia de la gravedad del problema del mal uso de los avances tecnolÃÂ³gicos, pero no se trata de un caso aislado, pues las expresiones vejatorias contra las mujeres en el mundo digital se reproducen constantemente.
english: The media coverage of this case has raised awareness in society about the seriousness of the problem of the misuse of technological advances, but it is not an isolated case, as demeaning expressions against women in the digital world are constantly reproduced.

ï»¿spanish: Un aÃÂ±o mÃÂ¡s sigue siendo necesario denunciar que la violencia de gÃÂ©nero es una violaciÃÂ³n de los derechos humanos en la que, las universidades, como parte de la sociedad, tenemos la responsabilidad de implicarnos activamente.
english: Another year, it remains necessary to denounce that gender violence is a violation of human rights in which universities, as part of society, have the responsibility to actively engage.

ï»¿spanish: Por eso, este mes es importante tambiÃÂ©n mostrar nuestra solidaridad con las niÃÂ±as y mujeres de todo el mundo que estÃÂ¡n sufriendo restricciones de sus derechos y a ser libres e iguales.
english: Therefore, this month it is also important to show solidarity with girls and women around the world who are experiencing restrictions on their rights and on being free and equal.

ï»¿spanish: Hoy, en Palestina, Ucrania, IrÃÂ¡n, AfganistÃÂ¡n y otros muchos lugares del mundo.
english: Today, in Palestine, Ukraine, Iran, Afghanistan, and many other places in the world.

ï»¿spanish: En esta ocasiÃÂ³n, apelamos a la genealogÃÂ­a feminista, a su historia, a la producciÃÂ³n de conocimientoÃÂ  acadÃÂ©mico con perspectiva de gÃÂ©nero, a la fuerza de las mujeres jÃÂ³venes y a la dimensiÃÂ³n humanaÃÂ  de la sociedad, para tejer, mÃÂ¡s que nunca, mundos de esperanza feminista, otro mundo posible, libre de violencias contra las mujeres y niÃÂ±as, porque los avances y el compromiso social e institucional es cada vez mayor frente a todas las violencias patriarcales en el espacio universitario y en la sociedad, en general.
english: On this occasion, we appeal to feminist genealogy, to its history, to academic knowledge production with a gender perspective, to the strength of young women, and to the human dimension of society, to weave, more than ever, worlds of feminist hope, another possible world, free from violence against women and girls, because advances and social and institutional commitment are increasingly greater in the face of all patriarchal violences in the university space and in society in general.

ï»¿spanish: Hoy, y todos los dÃÂ­as del aÃÂ±o, reivindicamos el feminismo como herramienta de emancipaciÃÂ³n para conseguir una sociedad en la que podamos ser y estar.
english: Today, and every day of the year, we reclaim feminism as a tool of emancipation to achieve a society in which we can be and exist.

ï»¿spanish: Generalmente se ha usado la geotermia en paÃÂ­ses muy frÃÂ­os para calentar edificios, pero en MÃÂ©xico la estamos utilizando para enfriar y ahorrar hasta un 50% en aire acondicionadoÃÂ, ha explicado el experto energÃÂ©tico de la Universidad Nacional AutÃÂ³noma de MÃÂ©xico David MorillÃÂ³n GÃÂ¡lvez, quien ha impartido una conferencia sobre arquitectura bioclimÃÂ¡tica.

ï»¿spanish: ÃÂLa geotermia es una alternativa sostenible cuando el uso de las condiciones medioambientales, como la radiaciÃÂ³n solar o el viento, no es suficiente para lograr temperaturas de confort para viviendas, edificios, industrias o granjasÃÂ, subraya el ingeniero mexicano, que estÃÂ¡ participando en proyectos que utilizan la energÃÂ­a geotÃÂ©rmica en el norte desÃÂ©rtico de su paÃÂ­s, con la tÃÂ©cnica de pozos canadienses, de escasa profundidad, y mediante las llamadas pilas energÃÂ©ticas usando los pilotes de cimentaciÃÂ³n que se requieren en las edificaciones en Ciudad de MÃÂ©xico.
english: "Geothermal energy is a sustainable alternative when the use of environmental conditions, such as solar radiation or wind, is not enough to achieve comfortable temperatures for homes, buildings, industries, or farms," emphasizes the Mexican engineer, who is involved in projects using geothermal energy in the desert north of his country, with the technique of Canadian wells, of shallow depth, and through the so-called energy piles using the foundation piles required in buildings in Mexico City.

ï»¿spanish: Mujer.

ï»¿spanish: El lema elegido en este 2023 para el DÃÂ­a Mundial contra la DesertificaciÃÂ³n es: ÃÂMujer. Sus tierras. Sus derechosÃÂ.

ï»¿spanish: Ino MartÃÂ­nez,?profesora del departamento de EconomÃÂ­a de la Empresa, destaca la importancia de la mujer contra la desertificaciÃÂ³n.
english: Ino MartÃÂ­nez, a professor in the Department of Business Economics, highlights the importance of women against desertification.

english: For the Coordinator of the University Master's Degree in Social Economy Entities, women have always had a fundamental role.

ï»¿spanish: ÃÂSon las mujeres quienes gestionan los recursos naturales: la tierra, el agua, ya que son ellas quienes, generalmente, cuidan sus jardines y se ocupan de la gestiÃÂ³n de su entorno.

ï»¿spanish: AdemÃÂ¡s, ÃÂcuidan de especies vegetales y animales, favoreciendo su conservaciÃÂ³n y la biodiversidadÃÂ, aÃÂ±ade.
english: Additionally, "they take care of plant and animal species, favoring their conservation and biodiversity," she adds.

english: And also, "they recognize the importance of the environment," she notes.

ï»¿spanish: Esta es la reflexiÃÂ³n de la profesora Ino MartÃÂ­nez en el DÃÂ­a Mundial de la DesertificaciÃÂ³n acerca del lema? ÃÂMujer. Sus tierras. Sus derechos".
english: This is Professor Ino MartÃÂ­nez's reflection on the World Day to Combat Desertification about the motto 'Woman. Her lands. Her rights'.

ï»¿spanish: El papel de la mujer contra la DesertificaciÃÂ³n.
english: The role of women against desertification.

ï»¿spanish: La importancia de sus tierras y derechos.
english: The importance of their lands and rights.

ï»¿spanish: La mujer ha tenido un papel fundamental en el medio rural tradicionalmente.
english: Women have traditionally had a fundamental role in rural areas.

ï»¿spanish: En 1992, en la conferencia conocida como ÃÂCumbre para la TierraÃÂ, celebrada en RÃÂ­o de Janeiro, se iniciaron las negociaciones a nivel internacional sobre las cuestiones relacionadas con el medio ambiente y desarrollo.
english: In 1992, at the conference known as the 'Earth Summit', held in Rio de Janeiro, international negotiations began on issues related to the environment and development.

ï»¿spanish: Asimismo, la DeclaraciÃÂ³n de RÃÂ­o (surgida de esta conferencia) definiÃÂ³ los derechos y obligaciones de los Estados respecto a los principios bÃÂ¡sicos sobre el medio ambiente y el desarrollo, y se formulÃÂ³ como idea clave, entre otras, el convencimiento de que la plena participaciÃÂ³n de la mujer era considerada imprescindible para el logro de un desarrollo sostenible.
english: Likewise, the Rio Declaration (arising from this conference) defined the rights and obligations of states regarding basic principles on the environment and development, and formulated as a key idea, among others, the belief that full women's participation was deemed essential for achieving sustainable development.

ï»¿spanish: Esto es debido a que las mujeres desarrollan cuatro funciones bÃÂ¡sicas en el medio rural: a) productiva, como titulares de una actividad econÃÂ³mica, trabajadoras asalariadas y ayuda familiar (invisibles a efectos estadÃÂ­sticos y econÃÂ³micos); b) social, siendo responsables del mantenimiento de la unidad familiar y del cuidado y bienestar de la poblaciÃÂ³n dependiente; c) cultural, al conservar y transmitir multitud de tradiciones culturales (gastronomÃÂ­a, labores artesanales y folklore, entre otras); y d) medioambiental.
english: This is because women perform four basic functions in rural areas: a) productive, as owners of an economic activity, wage workers, and family caregivers (invisible in statistical and economic terms); b) social, being responsible for maintaining family unity and caring for the welfare of the dependent population; c) cultural, by preserving and transmitting a multitude of cultural traditions (gastronomy, handicrafts, folklore, among others); and d) environmental.

ï»¿spanish: En esta funciÃÂ³n desarrollan actividades muy diferentes, dependiendo de si son titulares o no de tierra.
english: In this role, they carry out very different activities, depending on whether they are landowners or not.

ï»¿spanish: En tÃÂ©rminos generales, todas llevan a cabo la gestiÃÂ³n de recursos naturales (tierra, agua, bosques, ÃÂ), a travÃÂ©s del cuidado de sus jardines, zonas comunes colindantes, y gestiÃÂ³n de su entorno.
english: In general terms, they all carry out the management of natural resources (land, water, forests, ...), through the care of their gardens, adjacent common areas, and managing their environment.

ï»¿spanish: AdemÃÂ¡s, cuidan de especies vegetales y animales, favoreciendo su conservaciÃÂ³n y la biodiversidad.
english: Additionally, they take care of plant and animal species, favoring their conservation and biodiversity.

ï»¿spanish: Y participan en la educaciÃÂ³n y sensibilizaciÃÂ³n ambiental de las generaciones mÃÂ¡s jÃÂ³venes y de quienes les visitan (turismo rural), pues reconocen la importancia de la conservaciÃÂ³n del medio ambiente.
english: And they participate in the environmental education and awareness of younger generations and those who visit them (rural tourism), as they recognize the importance of environmental conservation.

ï»¿spanish: Si son propietarias de tierras y las explotan directamente, realizan prÃÂ¡cticas sostenibles de agricultura y ganaderÃÂ­a; pues conocen muy bien las plantas, los ciclos naturales y la biodiversidad.
english: If they own land and exploit it directly, they carry out sustainable agricultural and livestock practices; because they know plants, natural cycles, and biodiversity very well.

ï»¿spanish: En este sentido, desarrollan una agricultura sostenible, pues conservan semillas tradicionales, diversifican los cultivos, optimizan los recursos naturales, utilizan prÃÂ¡cticas agrÃÂ­colas respetuosas con el medio ambiente, y promocionan la agricultura ecolÃÂ³gica; lo que ayuda a mejorar la seguridad alimentaria y a reducir la desertificaciÃÂ³n.
english: In this sense, they develop sustainable agriculture, as they preserve traditional seeds, diversify crops, optimize natural resources, use environmentally friendly agricultural practices, and promote organic farming; which helps improve food security and reduce desertification.

ï»¿spanish: Asimismo, estas mujeres promueven el uso de energÃÂ­a renovables (eÃÂ³lica y solar) en sus comunidades y actividades empresariales, la reducciÃÂ³n de residuos, la reutilizaciÃÂ³n de materiales y la gestiÃÂ³n adecuada del agua, decreciendo las zonas que sufren la sequÃÂ­a y los efectos negativos de esta.
english: Furthermore, these women promote the use of renewable energy (wind and solar) in their communities and business activities, waste reduction, material reuse, and proper water management, decreasing areas affected by drought and its negative effects.

ï»¿spanish: Por su importante papel en el medio rural, y en la funciÃÂ³n medioambiental, es importante impulsar los derechos de las mujeres sobre las tierras de las que son propietarias, mitigando la influencia patriarcal (si existe), para que desarrollen las actividades que a ellas mÃÂ¡s les interesan, o en las que pueden aportar un mayor valor aÃÂ±adido por el conocimiento especÃÂ­fico y diferencial que tienen, creando y gestionando sus propios negocios.
english: Due to their important role in rural areas, and in the environmental function, it is important to promote women's rights to the lands they own, mitigating patriarchal influence (if it exists), so that they can develop the activities they are most interested in, or in which they can add greater value due to their specific and differential knowledge, creating and managing their own businesses.

ï»¿spanish: Por otro lado, es necesario reconocer su papel en las explotaciones que ellas dirigen, pues en muchas ocaciones son representadas por sus parejas, hermanos o padres en cooperativas, alhÃÂ³ndigas, bancos o en otras transacciones comerciales, quedando parcialmente invisibilizadas.
english: On the other hand, it is necessary to recognize their role in the enterprises they manage, as they are often represented by their partners, brothers, or fathers in cooperatives, stores, banks, or other commercial transactions, remaining partially invisible.

ï»¿spanish: Para ello, es imprescindible su empoderamiento y reconocimiento oficial, mediante la Titularidad de su negocio, y en caso de compartirla, la obtenciÃÂ³n de la Titularidad Compartida de su explotaciÃÂ³n, figura con escasa presencia en la RegiÃÂ³n de Murcia (donde sÃÂ³lo hay una mujer que la tiene: Adela GarcÃÂ­a Armero).
english: For this, their empowerment and official recognition are essential, through the Ownership of their business, and in the case of sharing it, obtaining Shared Ownership of their operation, a figure with limited presence in the Region of Murcia (where there is only one woman who has it: Adela GarcÃÂ­a Armero).

ï»¿spanish: Finalmente, las mujeres que realizan ayuda familiar en las explotaciones rurales familiares-, deben visibilizarse y ser reconocidas (con contrato laboral, seguridad social, nÃÂ³mina, trayectoria profesional) y los derechos que su condiciÃÂ³n les proporciona (pensiones de jubilaciÃÂ³n, tratamiento de enfermedades profesionales, etc.).
english: Finally, women who provide family assistance in family rural enterprises must be made visible and recognized (with a work contract, social security, salary, professional trajectory) and the rights that their condition provides them (retirement pensions, treatment of professional illnesses, etc.).

ï»¿spanish: Cuatro estudiantes de IngenierÃÂ­a Naval y OceÃÂ¡nica de la UPCT han desarrollado el prototipo de un generador de energÃÂ­a que utiliza el movimiento de las olas para alimentar los sistemas auxiliares del barco.
english: Four students from the Naval and Ocean Engineering program at UPCT have developed a prototype of an energy generator that uses the movement of the waves to power the auxiliary systems of the ship.

english: The Perseus Cloud is one of the closest stellar forming regions to the Solar System, and many of its stars are young and contain protoplanetary disks in which the physical processes leading to the formation of planets take place, as indicated by the Institute of Astrophysics of the Canary Islands (IAC).
